tool_description: Performs sentiment analysis on review text using advanced NLP models to determine positive, negative, or neutral sentiment with confidence scores.

review_texts.description: Array of preprocessed review text content

model_type.description: Sentiment analysis model: transformer, lstm, naive_bayes, or ensemble

language.description: Primary language code for optimal model selection

include_emotions.description: Whether to include detailed emotion classification

confidence_threshold.description: Minimum confidence threshold for sentiment classification (0.1-1.0)

error_messages: Invalid review_texts: Input must be a non-empty array of text strings. Ensure texts are properly preprocessed.
Unsupported model_type: Use one of [transformer, lstm, naive_bayes, ensemble]. Transformer models provide highest accuracy.
Invalid language code: Use ISO 639-1 language codes. Unsupported languages may default to English processing.
Confidence threshold out of range: Value must be between 0.1 and 1.0. Higher thresholds provide more certain classifications.
Processing capacity exceeded: Maximum 2500 texts per batch. Large datasets should be processed in multiple batches.
usage: Provide review_texts array and configure analysis parameters. The tool will analyze sentiment and return classifications with confidence scores and optional emotion details.

sentiment_labels.description: Array of sentiment labels: positive, negative, or neutral

confidence_scores.description: Confidence scores for each sentiment classification

sentiment_scores.description: Numerical sentiment scores ranging from -1 (negative) to +1 (positive)

emotion_labels.description: Detailed emotion classifications when include_emotions is enabled

overall_sentiment.description: Overall sentiment across all analyzed texts

sentiment_distribution.description: Distribution summary in format 'positive:X, negative:Y, neutral:Z'
